sentences.sentence: The content of this page is from the VOUVRAY port or VOUVRAY customs import and export company directory;
sentences.translation: 本页面内容主要是来自VOUVRAY港口或VOUVRAY海关的进出口公司目录；

sentences.sentence: When Victor Huet's son Gaston trudged 200 miles back to Vouvray, France, after the WWII liberation, he found his father's vineyard in devastation.
sentences.translation: 当第二次世界大战后维克多•予厄(Victor Huet)的儿子加斯顿(Gaston)跋涉200英里回到法国的沃莱时，他发现父亲的葡萄园已是满目疮痍。
